articles.author: Hadley Freeman
articles.title: Catherine O’Hara: woman behind the world’s favourite roles - The Times
articles.description: From the forgetful Home Alone mother to the formidable Moira Rose, the actress was responsible for some memorable characters — even if we didn’t know it
articles.content: Many will have first spotted the actress Catherine OHara when she played Kevins forgetful mother in the 1990 film Home Alone. For others, it was her performance 25 years later as Moira, the fabulousl… [+3827 chars]
